title: CEOs Don't Come Pre-Made, Authentic Leadership Has To Be Learned | TechCrunch
excerpt: Editor’s note: Scott Weiss is a partner at Andreessen Horowitz and the former co-founder and CEO of IronPort Systems, which was acquired by Cisco in 2007.   An approachable and authentic CEO is essential to fostering a high-performance, open communications culture.

title: The 3 most effective ways to build trust as a leader
excerpt: Based on data from 597 people, the best ways to build trust as a leader aren’t what you think they are. How do you build trust as a leader? The answer seems intuitive enough. For many of us, …
